alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 06 at 4:41PM MST until March 06 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light snow. Additional snow accumulation of an inch or two possible. Although the snow is decreasing, any additional accumulations will stick to the roadways as temperatures fall during the early evening hours. * WHERE...El Paso, Pueblo, Huerfano and eastern Fremont Counties including Colorado Springs, Monument, Pueblo and Walsenburg. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The secondary roadways in many locations are still slick. Main roadways may also become slick as pockets of snow are still expected to occur into the early evening hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
